thread.title: Southern Miss named top online program in state
thread.title_full: Southern Miss named top online program in state - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Southern Miss named top online program in state
text:
HATTIESBURG, Miss. (AP) - The University of Southern Mississippi's online education program has been named the best in the state for 2015-2016 by AffordableCollegesOnline.org.
The Sun Herald reports ( http://bit.ly/1ORA4Al ) the rankings are based on academic quality, student services and graduate success.
The "Online at Southern Miss" program allows students to find bachelor's, master's and Ph.D. programs in subjects ranging from elementary education to library information science. Certificate programs, supplemental endorsements, single courses and hybrid and executive programs are also available.
Of the seven Mississippi schools offering online programs, Belhaven University ranked second and Mississippi College came in third.
USM was also listed among the Best Value Schools' Top 30 Best Online Colleges for 2014.
Information from: The Hattiesburg American, http://www.hattiesburgamerican.com
